templates.title: Traefik Proxy
templates.name: traefik
templates.description: Traefik Proxy with dashboard and whoami service
templates.note: Deploys a Traefik instance with dashboard and whoami service.

env.name: CLOUDFLARE_DNS_API_TOKEN
env.label: Cloudflare dns api token
env.description: Cloudflare API Token with DNS edit permissions for the DOMAIN

env.name: CLOUDFLARE_EMAIL
env.label: Cloudflare email
env.description: Email address associated with the Cloudflare API Token

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Domain name
env.description: The domain for the host (e.g., example.com)

env.name: FQDN
env.label: Fully qualified domain name
env.description:
The fully qualified domain name for the host (e.g., server.example.com becomes...)
 * proxy.server.example.com for accessing the Traefik dashboard
 * whoami.server.example.com for accessing the Whoami test service

env.name: HOST_DATA_PATH
env.label: Host data path
env.description: (optional) Path on the host where Traefik data will be stored (default: /data/traefik)

env.name: HOSTNAME
env.label: Hostname
env.description:
The hostname for the host (e.g., server.local becomes...)
 * proxy.server.local for accessing the Traefik dashboard
 * whoami.server.local for accessing the Whoami test service
